page.title: 20CONCLUSION AND CREDITS.
page.content: This area, as the reader can gather from the previous pages, is a {beautiful though rather isolated part {of our country.}The views are really outstanding and there is{plenty here } {for the tourist}from lovely drives, to breathtaking walks, fishing, shooting and a very slow pace of life.The local people are friendly and helpful. Each season brings its own wonderful sights.The newly born lambs in Spring, haymaking and harvesting in Summer, the ploughing and the changing colours of the trees in Autumn, and the bleakness and heavy snow falls in Winter. {The children of Michaelchurch } {Escley C.P.School}carried out this project.They live in this area and thoroughly appreciate their luck.There are drawbacks living here but these are outweighed by the pleasures.
